articles.title: In the iPad Mini 7 Box: No Charger in Europe, New Braided USB-C Cable - MacRumors
articles.description: The new iPad mini 7 does not come with a charger in the box in European countries, including the UK, France, Germany, Italy, Spain, the Netherlands,...
articles.content: The new iPad mini 7 does not come with a charger in the box in European countries, including the UK, France, Germany, Italy, Spain, the Netherlands, and others. This change is likely in response to E… [+1176 chars]
